description:
A gym-centric shoe for those developing their skills. The kid's Momentum shoe takes much of the technology from the adult version, such as the Engineered Knit upper and the NeoFriction rubber, and packs it into a small package for young climbers.

  • Engineered Knit upper keeps feet comfy and cool
  • Shape is designed for comfort and support for growing feet
  • Velcro strap tunes in the fit
  • Soft-flex Microfabric midsole adds sensitivity while supporting feet
  • 4.3mm NeoFriction rubber is designed for durability, consistency and lightness
name: Black Diamond Momentum Rock Shoes - Children
